title: Lake Geneva Wisconsin notice of claims

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Wisconsin Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

o the Records Custodian,

Pursuant to the Wisconsin Public Records Law, Wis. Stat. §§ 19.31–19.39, I request access to and copies of records concerning litigation in which the City of Lake Geneva is involved or is likely to become involved regarding Bloomfield Holdings, LLC and Fairwyn SB, Inc.

Specifically, I request the following records, whether created, received, or maintained by the City:

Any lawsuits, claims, notices of claim, demand letters, or threatened litigation correspondence involving Bloomfield Holdings, LLC and/or Fairwyn SB, Inc.

Any communications (including emails, letters, memoranda, or reports) between the City and:

Bloomfield Holdings, LLC or Fairwyn SB, Inc.;

their representatives, attorneys, insurers, or agents;

the City’s outside counsel, insurers, or risk-management providers
that reference pending or potential litigation involving either entity.

Any City Council, committee, or closed-session agenda items, minutes, packets, memoranda, or resolutions referencing litigation, threatened litigation, or legal strategy involving Bloomfield Holdings, LLC and/or Fairwyn SB, Inc. (including redacted versions where applicable).

Any retainer agreements, engagement letters, or billing records (including invoices or billing summaries) for outside legal counsel relating to litigation or anticipated litigation involving Bloomfield Holdings, LLC and/or Fairwyn SB, Inc.

This request covers records from January 1, 2026 to the present.

If any records are withheld or redacted, please identify the specific statutory basis for each withholding, as required by Wis. Stat. § 19.35(4), and provide all reasonably segregable non-exempt portions of the records.

I request that responsive records be provided electronically by email where available. If there are any costs associated with fulfilling this request, please notify me in advance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Gary Milliette

title: Lake Geneva, Wisconsin land appraisal for sale of public land

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Wisconsin Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Appraisal Report for city property located on Sheridan Springs Rd
tax key parcels ZA467900001, ZA467900002, ZA468000001 & ZA468000002.

As presented at the City Council meeting of 9.22.25.

thank you in advance

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Gary Milliette

communications.subject: Wisconsin Open Records Act Request: Lake Geneva Wisconsin legal settlements 2025
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Wisconsin Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Wisconsin Public Records Law, Wis. Stat. §§ 19.31–19.39, I request access to and copies of the following records:

Any settlement agreements, separation agreements, release agreements, or resolution agreements between the City of Lake Geneva and Lana Kropf, whether formal or informal, including any agreements reached through counsel, insurers, or third-party administrators.

Any payment authorizations, settlement payment records, vouchers, wire confirmations, or accounting entries reflecting payments or consideration provided to or on behalf of Lana Kropf.

Any City Council, committee, or closed-session agenda items, minutes, memoranda, or resolutions referencing approval, discussion, or ratification of a settlement or resolution involving Lana Kropf (including redacted versions if necessary).

Any correspondence between the City (including elected officials, employees, outside counsel, or insurers) and Lana Kropf or her representatives that references a settlement, release, resolution, or payment.

This request covers records created, received, or maintained from January 1, 2024 to the present.

If any portion of this request is denied, please provide the specific statutory basis for each denial, as required by Wis. Stat. § 19.35(4), and release any reasonably segregable non-exempt portions of the records.

I request that records be provided electronically by email where available. If there will be any costs associated with this request, please inform me in advance.

As required by Wisconsin law, I expect a response as soon as practicable and without delay.

Thank you for your assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Gary Milliette

title: Lake Geneva Wisconsin land sale appraisal

communications.subject: Wisconsin Open Records Act Request: Lake Geneva Wisconsin land sale appraisal
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Wisconsin Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Appraisal for tax key parcels ZA467900001, ZA467900002, ZA468000001 & ZA468000002.
In the city of Lake Geneva, Wisconsin. Used by the Lake Geneva Wisconsin City Council on 1/12/26.
Also invoice for said appraisal.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Gary Milliette
